full_summary:
**Cancelled Tender No. PW-22-01017290**
======================================================

Announcement:
------------

A previous Request for Proposal (RFP) with Solicitation Number W8486-238974/A, published on December 14, 2022, under the reference number PW-22-01017290, has been cancelled.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

- **Solicitation Number**: W8486-238974/A
- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01017290
- **Publication Date**: December 14, 2022
- **Cancellation Date**: February 14, 2022 (estimated)

**Service Description**
---------------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor with expertise in Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS).

**Trading Agreements**
-------------------

This RFP may be of interest to Canadian businesses that are registered under one of the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Geographic Area**
------------------

The supplying country is Canada. The supplied services may be required to be delivered to clients across several regions including New Brunswick, Quebec (except National Capital Region), National Capital Region, Ontario (except National Capital Region), Alberta, and Manitoba.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further inquiry and information, please contact:

- Name: Kelsey Lawrence
- Email: kelsey.lawrence2@forces.gc.ca
- Address: 455 Blvd de la Carriere, Gatineau, QC

Note: Please be aware that this announcement relates to a previously cancelled tender. Please do not make any attempt to submit a proposal as these efforts will not be considered.  



Here is a written summary of your transformation and analysis of the process:

------------
